detailsSection: Lync 2010 Short Videos provides 15-30 video snippets of the most commonly used features in Lync 2010.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems:Windows Server 2003;Windows Vista;Windows XP;Window 7

This download pertains to the following Office applications: Microsoft Lync 2010

You can view the Lync 2010 Short Videos with any video player that can view .wmv files, such as Microsoft Windows Media Player.
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, extract the files to a folder. To remove this download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
